content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: longer_than_or_equal_to
      value: 21
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0415
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Verify that ARMCD in TA domain is valid planned arm code
Outcome:
  Message: Length of ARMCD must be less than or equal to 20 characters
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Value
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0415
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A trial design domain that contains each planned arm
                  in the trial.
                Document: IG 3.4
                Item: ''
                Section: 7.2.1 TA
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TA

json.Description: Verify that ARMCD in TA domain is valid planned arm code

Outcome.Message: Length of ARMCD must be less than or equal to 20 characters

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A trial design domain that contains each planned arm in the trial.
